I placed an order from this restaurant pork chops with white rice and beans, plus an order of boneless chicken chunks and fries. I called at 8:35pm and after over an hour with no delivery, I decided to call back to check on the status. Every time I tried to explain my order, they kept hanging up on me. It was beyond frustrating. It‚Äôs now 9:30 pm and I still haven‚Äôt received the dinner I was really looking forward to. I don‚Äôt usually leave complaints, but this restaurant seriously needs to improve its service!

I ordered food for my parents from El Valle Restaurant through the Seamless app and I received a text notification that the order was completed and the delivery was made. However, my parents did not receive the food and when I called the courier he did not answer. I then called the restaurant and they said that the order was actually not completed because they did not have chicken. The restaurant should have called me to tell me they did not have chicken but they didn't do that. I requested a refund from Seamless and I will not order from this restaurant again.

I am horribly upset about what happened. Okay first, I wanted cheese pastelitos and they gave me beef. Second of all, I call them informing them of the mishap and they said they would give me my right one. MIND YOU, I already opened the bag with the beef, so I didn't think they would want it back. GIRL, tell me why they wanted to exchange it for my actual order. I asked them if they were sure cause its not sanitary and he said yes and he even called his boss. Tell me why, the minute I went inside to get the wrong order, the boss tells him to LEAVE and he leaves with my actual order. I WAS FURIOUS. Never again. If I could give them a zero, I would. Do NOT order from here. Thank you.
